channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- Gerrit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- Gerrit

item.title: CVE-2021-22553|2024-09-16T19:51:15.662Z -- google%20llc -- gerrit
item.description: Any git operation is passed through Jetty and a session is created. No expiry is set for the session and Jetty does not automatically dispose of the session. Over multiple git actions, this can lead to a heap memory exhaustion for Gerrit servers. We recommend upgrading Gerrit to any of the versions listed above.
